quotes.serbian: Vrana vrani oči ne vadi.
quotes.english: A crow doesn't pick out another crow's eyes.

quotes.serbian: Bolje vrabac u ruci, nego golub na grani.
quotes.english: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
quotes.meaning: Something you have for certain now is of more value than something better you may get, especially if you risk losing what you have in order to get it.

quotes.serbian: Bog je prvo sebi bradu stvorio.
quotes.english: God created the beard on himself first.
quotes.meaning: Help yourself before you help others.

quotes.serbian: Gvožđe se kuje dok je vruće.
quotes.english: Strike while the iron is hot.

quotes.serbian: Gde ti mnogo obećavaju, malu torbu ponesi.
quotes.english: He who promises too much means nothing.

quotes.serbian: Gde je mnogo babica, kilava su deca.
quotes.english: Too many cooks spoil the broth.

quotes.serbian: Iver ne pada daleko od klade.
quotes.english: An apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
quotes.meaning: Children observe daily and — in their behaviour — often follow the example of their parents.

quotes.serbian: Jutro je pametnije od večeri.
quotes.english: The morning is wiser than the evening.
quotes.meaning: Sleeping over can make problems be solved easier.

quotes.serbian: Ko drugome jamu kopa sam u nju pada.
quotes.english: Who digs a trap for others ends up in it himself.

quotes.serbian: Ko rano rani, dve sreće grabi.
quotes.english: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
quotes.meaning: A lifestyle that involves either staying up late nor sleeping late is good for body and mind and leads to financial success.

quotes.serbian: Nema vatre bez dima.
quotes.english: A crow doesn't pick out another crow's eyes.
quotes.meaning: It is supposed that if there is a rumour, there must be some truth behind it.

quotes.serbian: Nije zlato sve što sija.
quotes.english: All that glitters is not gold.
quotes.meaning: An attractive appearance may be deceptive. It may cover or hide a much less favourable content.

quotes.serbian: Pas koji laje ne ujeda.
quotes.english: Barking dogs seldom bite.
quotes.meaning: People who make the most or the loudest threats are the least likely to take action.

quotes.serbian: Ispeci pa reci.
quotes.english: First think before you speak.

quotes.serbian: Prvo skoči pa reci hop.
quotes.english: Walk the walk, then talk the talk.
quotes.meaning: First do your task, then talk about it.

quotes.serbian: Triput meri, jednom seci.
quotes.english: Measure thrice, cut once.
quotes.meaning: One should always act only after due consideration. A hasty action may involve an improper consideration of important aspects.

quotes.serbian: Uzdaj se u se i u svoje kljuse!
quotes.english: Distrust is the mother of safety.
quotes.meaning: Trust no one; Trust, but verify.

quotes.serbian: Što možeš danas, ne ostavljaj za sutra.
quotes.english: Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

quotes.serbian: Dela govore, a ne reči.
quotes.english: No need of words, trust deeds.
quotes.meaning: Actions may be, and indeed sometimes are deceptive in a measure though not as much so as words; and accordingly are received in general as more full and satisfactory proofs of the real disposition and character of persons than verbal expressions.

quotes.serbian: Ne videti šumu od drveta.
quotes.english: Not seeing the forest for the trees.
quotes.meaning: To pay too much attention to details and not understand the general situation.

quotes.serbian: Nova metla dobro mete.
quotes.english: New brooms sweep clean.

quotes.serbian: Sve se vraća, sve se plaća.
quotes.english: What goes around comes around.
quotes.meaning: Evil acts quite often punish themselves. Conversely, good acts quite often reward themselves.
